com.example.kit

Class ItemViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.example.kit.ItemViewHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagChipGroup.OnTagChipCloseListener

    public class ItemViewHolder
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements TagChipGroup.OnTagChipCloseListener
    A RecyclerView ViewHolder for an Item to be displayed. Shows the Name, Value, Acquisition Date, and Tags of the item.
